import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' function ShippingScreen({history}) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart ) const { shippingAddress } = cart //destrutturo shippingAddress dal cart dello state const dispatch = useDispatch() const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address, city, postalCode, country})) history.push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)}> City setCity(e.target.value)}> Postal code setPostalCode(e.target.value)}> Country setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default ShippingScreen
